name_localized.en: City View King One Bed Suite Manhattan View ADA

short_description_localized.en: Featuring four-fixture bathrooms and beautiful Manhattan views, our 800 square foot City View King One Bedroom Suites offer quintessential Manhattan charm and are situated on floors 14 to 21.
